summary: A beautiful player home in a custom aspen tree forest.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6]                [color=#a61c00][color=#f1c232]A[/color]svald - [color=#f1c232]T[/color]he [color=#f1c232]R[/color]edleaf [color=#f1c232]F[/color]orest[/color][/size][/font][/b]

[youtube]xwni1ryNKZg[/youtube]              [youtube]8F4Ysksa2XA[/youtube] 
[img]http://www.upload-pictures.de/bild.php/66575,asdasdasdasdJWXVX.jpg[/img]

[img]http://www.upload-pictures.de/bild.php/66574,agdfhhd7C2FA.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.upload-pictures.de/bild.php/66576,dssddffgdsfghjfgXYSRC.jpg[/img]
[color=#a61c00][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][color=#f1c232]D[/color]escription[/size][/font][/b][/color]

[font=Comic Sans MS]This is beautiful and lore friendly house mod in a custom worldspace, its is surrounded by a lush aspen tree forest what makes a very beautiful exterior, you can just sit for days outside to just listen the sound of the nature.[/font]

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#a61c00][size=6][color=#f1c232]F[/color]eatures[/size][/color][/font][/b]

[font=Comic Sans MS]-The house have an outside smithing place with a custom blaksmith vendor and alchemy/enchanting tables wich can be accessed with blue light portals (surrounded by a few stones you can't miss it) from the inside of the house.
-There are a few custom NPC's inside to make the things more interesting - a misc vendor, guard (can be a follower), and a few naked girls.
-Cooking place.
-Mannequins, weaponracks and bookshelfs.
-A short quest to introduce you in everything, at the end of the quest you'll get a teleportation spell to bring you quickly to the house and back to Tamriel.
[/font]
[color=#a61c00][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][color=#f1c232]I[/color]nstallation[/size][/font][/b][/color]

[font=Comic Sans MS]Drop the files into your data folder or use NMM.[/font]

[color=#a61c00][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][color=#f1c232]R[/color]ecommended mods:[/size][/font][/b][/color]

[font=Comic Sans MS]I highly recomend these mods to make the trip much much better and to look like in the pictures[/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D6709%26preview%3D&pUp=1]DIMONIZED UNP Femal Body
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51069/?]Realistic Aspen Trees (overwrite if you got installed Skyrim Flora Overhaul or other aspen trees mod)
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]Skyrim HD - 2k Textures[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D141&pUp=1]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D3563%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Coverwoman[/url]

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#a61c00][size=6][color=#f1c232]O[/color]ptional mods:[/size][/color][/font][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D30936%26preview%3D&pUp=1]RealVision ENB
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29608/?]Detailed Rugs
[/url]
[font=Comic Sans MS]The mod should not conflict with anything because its in a new custom world, test it and let me know if you liked it.[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#a61c00][size=6]>[color=#e69138]IMPORTANT[/color]<[/size][/color][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS]To start the quest you need to go in the tavern The Bannered Mare in Whiterun, simply sit on one of the bar stools and wait until you get the quest.[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Also Install the quest update file.[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]For Every one who don't can or won't do the quest, install the spell tomes file and the tomes will be on the desk in the mansions bedroom.[/font]
author: Same Dee

files.name: important update file for the quest
